trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Orange
There were no other sightings in Orange on or around November 30th 1966
divs: Sighting Detailsas a small child my sister, our neighbors randy ,age6,jeff,age4, myself,age4,and their father,jerry don wiggins, saw a large ufo hover overhead without asound. it was a nice clear day, we childeren playing in their backyard, and wesaw a silver ufo 100yards long, 50yards high fly over at about 150-200feet inthe air.it was going south at maybe 5mph.it had windows like an airplane all theway around and we could see peoples heads looking down at us. we went to getour mother to come see ,but see did not belive us.Mr Wiggins came out and sawit. we chased after it until it dissappeard over the pine trees towards the KOGTam radio station in orange,tx.we called the radio station to tell themm about itand the incident was and still is quite a disscussion topic in our family.Pleaselimit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typed page).
